name: 64 Keys
description:
Made for the LowRezJam 2021, 64 Keys is a SIMON-like action game where you have 64 seconds to strike 64 keys thereby scoring 64 points all in glorious 64 x 64 resolution!

Hit the keys that correspond with what is on the game screen to clear them and score a point. If you're too slow, then it's back to the start. You need to be fast and accurate.

Feel like a greater challenge? Then press the "E" key at the title screen to play in "Expert Mode" where you lose if you make even one false keystroke, so mind your fat-fingering!
